name: mockingjays
description: Mockingjays is a proxying library that responds with previously observed responses.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:test
scripts.build:core: babel src -d build/src --copy-files && babel bin -d build/bin --copy-files && babel index.js -d build/
scripts.build:test: npm run build:test:feature && npm run build:test:unit
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:feature
scripts.test:unit: npm run clean && npm run build && mocha --exit ./build/test
scripts.test:feature: npm run clean && npm run build && (cd build && cucumber-js)

author: Bladymir Tellez <btellez@gmail.com>
